data.price: 2. isi naqoosak isih faxe mara Qhuraan barse.

dua.name: Ayat al-Rahman
dua.significanceReason: Initiates the Surah of Mercy, profoundly emphasizing divine compassion, teaching, and the comprehensive nature of Allah's mercy.

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
